Mr Eric Schmidt , who will become executive chairman of the search giant, said the new structure will produce even better results for the corporation . He explained that the previous structure, in which the triumvirate took collective decisions, had slowed down decision making. 41-year-old, currently Controller of BBC Global News, replaces Andy Coulson , who resigned earlier this month amid the continuing row over phone-hacking when he was editor of the News of the World. Mr David Cameron said: I am very pleased that Craig Oliver is to become the new Director of Communications at 10 Downing Street.`` Craig has formidable experience as a broadcast journalist. He will do an excellent job in explaining and communicating the Government's programme. `` It's difficult to leave the BBC after a fascinating few years- but this is an opportunity I can't turn down.''
